description: The Pomerelle Mountain Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.

name: Snow Report for Pomerelle Mountain
shortDescription: The Pomerelle Mountain Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Pomerelle Mountain.
